content: That's so cool that Lana Del Rey is coming to the Greek Theatre, I've been to that venue before when I saw Khalid with my sister, Sophia, and it's such a great spot for a concert. I'll definitely check out the other options you mentioned, thanks! Do you know if there are any music festivals happening in the Bay Area this summer or fall? I had a blast at the Governors Ball Music Festival in New York City with my friends Alex and Emma, and I'd love to attend another one soon.
